ygData.subject: Post Patch Pottery Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, has anybody found out the situation in regards to our beloved craft and the latest patches? Just curious about pricing, selling, etc.  The questions I have
ygData.messageBody:
OK, has anybody found out the situation in regards to our beloved craft and
the latest patches?

Just curious about pricing, selling, etc. The questions I have are:

How much has the cost gone up on the sketches? Give a before and after
please
How much has the sell back value of sketches been altered? Once again
before and after
Has the success rate been modified any?
Has the sale prices of finished products been altered?
Has there been any versioning of the sketches? Meaning do the old sketches
sell for one price (back to merchants) and the new ones sell for a higher
price.
Are there any new sketches and additions to the pottery books?


dwh
